name: Walls Up!
description:
You are an unknown protagonist defending yourself from a horde of zombies.

Made for #LOWREZJAM

Controls

  • Arrowkeys - Movement
  • Left Click - Kill Zombies
  • Right Click on wall derbis - Repair walls

Bonus control (if you get stuck etc.): Middle Mouseclick on wall - Destroy wall

It was a fun game to work with and i will do a remake later on the game without the 64x64 resolution when the jam is over :)
